body.p: I hereby Certify that I have known Thomas C Donn, for the past twenty five Years and I Can State that he is a person in all respects qualified to act as a commissioner of Deeds, affidavits, Depositions and other instruments of Writing for the State of Kentucky, and that he is a Loyal to the Government of the United States
Witness my hand as Mayor of the City of Washington.
I hereby Certify that I have been acquainted With Thomas C Donn for Ten Years, and join with R. Wallach Eqr the Mayor, as to the qualifications and Loyalty of Mr Donn, as aforesaid

Edward C. Carrington
E. S. Atty" for D. C.
